subject: Inquiry about Delivery
description_text:
Good day,

I am writing to ask about the experience of delivering to the Philippines.
Do you have any experience with it with regard to sending orders to the
Philippines?  If so, are there any difficulties along the way? For example,
customs and other things.

Thank you very much for answering my questions!

conversations.body_text:
Also, what are your guidelines about warranty? How long is it valid for?
And how to avail the warranty?

On Sun, 16 Nov 2025, 10:39 pm General and sales enquiries, <
service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> Yes, we haven't encountered any problems with our orders shipped to the
> Philippines so far, such as customs duties.
>
>
>
> ----------Reply to Message----------
>
Also, what are your guidelines about warranty? How long is it valid for? And how to avail the warranty?
Hi Sean Campo,    Purchases made on our official website come with a two-year warranty. We will resolve any issues you encounter, and if a solution cannot be found, we will replace your item.
